name: PTERANODON

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.
